translation.Site com interface simples conectado a A: Website with a simple interface connected to the Web Speech API voice recognition API.
translation.Página que lista os personagens de Rick: Page that lists the characters from Rick and Morty consuming an API.
translation.Este site que você está vendo (feito em: This website you're seeing (made with React).
translation.Jogo da velha simples feito em React: Simple tic tac toe game made with React.
translation.Bem vindo! Meu nome é Marcos Monção Mats: Welcome! My name is Marcos Monção Matsuo and I'm a Front-end developer. I've been involved with programming since I was 12 years old, and more recently, I've been studying Front-end, which I was instantly interested in.
translation.Possuo ampla experiência em desenvolvime: I have extensive experience in web development, holding a professional qualification certificate obtained during my high school with integrated technical degree. In addition, I have a considerable amount of practice in my own projects.
translation.Acredito que a constância e a disciplina: I believe that consistency and discipline are the most important aspects to evolve and that's why I follow this philosophy in my life, study, and work, to one day achieve my goal of becoming a Full-stack developer.
translation.Agradeço a sua visita e espero vê-lo nov: Thank you for your visit and I hope to see you again soon!
